name: Pizza Redemption: The Ballad of Home-Slice
name_original: Pizza Redemption: The Ballad of Home-Slice
description:
I actually will be adding on to this. But this is the story mode, so to speak. Happy Halloween. The Save system is pretty jank right now ngl. YOU RELOAD YOUR SAVE WHEN YOU DIE, so save wisely!

CONTROLS KEYBOARD
Z - Interact/ Select/Next Message
X - Back
Spacebar - Jump. 
A - Use weapon
Y - Flourish/ Alternative Fire for weapon
D - Pizza Time (when unlocked)
TAB - Menu for saving/loading. Does not pause time.
Q + W to switch appearances. Must be standing still and in a scene where the portrait is visible.

CONTROLS XBOX CONTROLLER
RB - Interact/ Select/Next Message
A - Jump. 
X - Use weapon
Y - Flourish/ Alternative Fire for weapon
B - Pizza Time (when unlocked)
START - Menu for saving/loading. Does not pause time.
LB + RB  to switch appearances. Must be standing still and in a scene where the portrait is visible.
